title: shankari nIvE
sahitya:
shankari nIvE (amba) shankari nIvani ninnu santatamu kOri vacciti


anupallavi

  sankaTamu dIrcci brOcuTaku inkevarunnAru ilalO pankaja sambhava sannuta pAlincu kAmAkSi 
(ciTTasvara)
r , , , , , , ,  s , , , , , , , r n* d*p* s n* r s  g , , , , , , , m , , , , , , , d p m p g r , s 
s , r n* d*p* s  n*r s g r g , m p d p S n R S M G R S R n d p m , p g r s 
 , , R n d p m m , g r s
				(svara sAhityam)
shrI kAnci sadana suradana rAkA shashi vadana rAvE  kOkila nibha mrduLa gadana 
kOrina varamu losagipuDu parAku salupa rAdu bhAramA parama krpAnidhivi


caraNam 1    kanakAdri sadana dIna jana rakSakiyanucu sanakAdi munulella bhajana sEyu cuNDaganu 
munu mukuni brOcinadellanu cAla vini vacciti vinumA ghanamA ninu namminavADanu rakSimpa 
    caraNam 2    vala vairi vinuta dEva kula kAnta kulaina khala dAnava bala khaNDana mula jEsi suralaku 
phaladAyaki nI valanE galadA yE ilalOpala khaluSAnala vArida shrI lalitAmbikA rakSimpa
    caraNam 3    karuNAbdi vani kumAruDu niratambu nutinci paritApamulanu dIrcuTa dharalOna ninu vinA 
mari evaru lErani O varadAyini morapeTTitE karuNincuTa nI karudA nera dAtavu rakSimpa
